title: Special Issue: "Genomics and Models of Nerve Sheath Tumors".
abstract: Nerve sheath tumors arising in the context of neurofibromatosis type 1 (NF1) include benign tumors such as cutaneous, diffuse and plexiform neurofibromas; atypical neurofibromas or atypical neurofibromatosis neoplasms of uncertain biological potential (ANNUBP); and the aggressive soft tissue sarcoma, the malignant peripheral nerve sheath tumor (MPNST) [...].
authors: Angela C Hirbe; Rebecca D Dodd; Christine A Pratilas
